body: omg i hope that guy comes block all exits on that house and burn their house with those two! for the greater good! of humans...

All of this could have been avoided with artificial insemination, but the husband is such a selfish masochistic cunt that he has to drag his wife into doing things she doesn't even want to do. Disgusting. Strangely I share the Sempai's final thought on the matter.

They are seriously fucked in the head.
And the best in the end, she ask him if he is willing to raise the child from an other man if she get pregnant and he is ok with it.
It seem that Haruka want to stop it and stay with her husband because she love him but the asshole don't want her to stop then she will made him suffer in any way possible. If the next lover is smart he can have an almost normal life with Haruka if the husband really wanted to be the ultimate cuckold, the more he suffer the more he is happy right?.

What the fuck, why did she choose to stay with that scumbag. He doesn't even make any sense at all. Oh god... And here I thought we would have the pleasure of seeing papers signed in that scumbag's blood.
Okay. So the husband wants the wife to fuck every man in the neighborhood so we can get hard and impregnate his wife. Guys, IVF exist right? RIGHT??

What the fuck was that? Seriously what the fuck is this shit? Either the author is on fucking drugs, retarded or he was NTR'ed so many times that he just went fucking insane to do this.
"To suffer is to love"? Don't fucking joke with me, "love" is something to be enjoy not to suffer, that is just fucked up.

This just got real retarded real fast. Obviously the MC has problems but the bitch is actually staying with him. At the very least, the senpai would actually hold Haruka close to him. Apparently talk no jutsu is too stronk. "To suffer is to love" GTFO of here, stupidest thing I've ever heard next to Swag, Yolo, and Suwoo.
" You are one fucked up husband and wife." This is what everyone is yelling at their computer right now!

Haruka is a pity. Only glad that it was over and my husband changed his mind, like a born again of "brilliant" idea: "To suffer is to love". It looks like a guy hidden masochist.
I hope nevertheless that the remaining chapters brain guy camp more and they will be a normal family. Or Haruka finds itself as a result of other, more appropriate.
